entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
